_meta.description: Comprehensive talent ability definitions for SWSE Foundry system

block.name: Block
block.description: Make a Use the Force check to negate a melee attack. If your check equals or exceeds the attack roll, the attack deals no damage.
block.trigger: When hit by a melee attack

deflect.name: Deflect
deflect.description: Make a Use the Force check to negate a ranged attack. If your check equals or exceeds the attack roll, the attack deals no damage.
deflect.trigger: When hit by a ranged attack

redirect-shot.name: Redirect Shot
redirect-shot.description: When you successfully deflect a ranged attack, you may redirect the attack at any target within 6 squares. Make a Use the Force check; if it equals or exceeds the new target's Reflex Defense, the attack hits. Alternatively, spend a Force Point to automatically hit.

alternativeAction.name: Auto-Hit Redirect
alternativeAction.effect: Automatically redirect and hit any target within 6 squares

adept-negotiator.name: Adept Negotiator
adept-negotiator.description: As a standard action, make a Persuasion check against the target's Will Defense. If successful, move the target -1 step on the condition track. You gain +5 bonus if opponent is higher level. If at bottom of track, target cannot attack unless attacked first.

master-negotiator.name: Master Negotiator
master-negotiator.description: As Adept Negotiator, but the target moves -2 steps on the condition track instead of -1.

skilled-advisor.name: Skilled Advisor
skilled-advisor.description: As a full-round action, grant one ally within line of sight +5 bonus on their next skill check. If you spend a Force Point, the bonus increases to +10.

force-persuasion.name: Force Persuasion
force-persuasion.description: You may use your Use the Force skill modifier instead of your Persuasion skill modifier when making Persuasion checks.

force-focus.name: Force Focus
force-focus.description: Add one-half your character level (rounded down) to Use the Force checks. Once per encounter, you may regain one spent Force power as a swift action. You may also spend a Force Point as a swift action to regain a spent Force power.

alternativeAction.name: Regain via Force Point
alternativeAction.effect: Spend a Force Point to regain one spent Force power (no limit)

inspire-confidence.name: Inspire Confidence
inspire-confidence.description: As a standard action, grant all allies within line of sight a +1 morale bonus to attack rolls and skill checks for the encounter. Alternatively, as a swift action, allow one unconscious ally to immediately regain consciousness with 1 HP.

alternativeAction.effect: One unconscious ally within line of sight regains consciousness with 1 HP

bolster-ally.name: Bolster Ally
bolster-ally.description: As a standard action, move one ally within line of sight +1 step on the condition track.

ignite-fervor.name: Ignite Fervor
ignite-fervor.description: When you hit with an attack, as a swift action, you may grant one ally within line of sight a bonus to their next damage roll equal to their level.
ignite-fervor.trigger: After you hit with an attack

willpower.name: Willpower
willpower.description: Once per encounter, as a swift action, grant all allies within line of sight a +2 morale bonus to Will Defense for the rest of the encounter.

beloved.name: Beloved
beloved.description: Choose one effect: (1) Swift action - grant one ally +2 Reflex Defense until your next turn; (2) Immediate action - grant one ally a free attack; (3) Reaction - allow all allies within 6 squares to move up to their speed.

choices.name: Defensive Aid
choices.effect: Grant one ally +2 Reflex Defense until your next turn

choices.name: Offensive Aid
choices.effect: Grant one ally a free attack

choices.name: Tactical Retreat
choices.effect: All allies within 6 squares may move up to their speed

sneak-attack.name: Sneak Attack
sneak-attack.description: Once per round, when you hit a target denied its Dexterity bonus to Reflex Defense, deal +1d6 extra damage. Additional Sneak Attack talents increase this by +1d6 each.
sneak-attack.trigger: Target is denied Dex bonus to Reflex Defense

skirmisher.name: Skirmisher
skirmisher.description: Deal +1d6 extra damage when you hit a target you did not attack on your previous turn.
skirmisher.trigger: Hit a target you didn't attack last turn

dastardly-strike.name: Dastardly Strike
dastardly-strike.description: When you deal damage to an opponent denied their Dex bonus to Reflex Defense, move them -1 step on the condition track.
dastardly-strike.trigger: Deal damage to target denied Dex bonus

devastating-attack.name: Devastating Attack
devastating-attack.description: Once per encounter, when you hit with a melee attack using a weapon in which you have Weapon Focus, deal +1 die of damage.

weapon-specialization.name: Weapon Specialization
weapon-specialization.description: Deal +2 damage with weapons of a selected weapon group.

greater-weapon-specialization.name: Greater Weapon Specialization
greater-weapon-specialization.description: Deal +2 additional damage (total +4) with weapons of a selected weapon group. Requires Weapon Specialization in same group.

uncanny-dodge-1.name: Uncanny Dodge I
uncanny-dodge-1.description: You retain your Dexterity bonus to Reflex Defense even when flat-footed.

uncanny-dodge-2.name: Uncanny Dodge II
uncanny-dodge-2.description: You cannot be flanked. Sneak attacks against you only work if the attacker is 4+ levels higher.

evasion.name: Evasion
evasion.description: If an attack against your Reflex Defense deals half damage on a miss, you take no damage on a miss instead.

improved-evasion.name: Improved Evasion
improved-evasion.description: If an attack against your Reflex Defense deals half damage on a miss, you take half damage on a hit instead of full damage.

hide-in-plain-sight.name: Hide in Plain Sight
hide-in-plain-sight.description: You can make Stealth checks to hide even while being observed, without needing cover or concealment.

improved-stealth.name: Improved Stealth
improved-stealth.description: You can move at full speed while using Stealth without taking a penalty.

total-concealment.name: Total Concealment
total-concealment.description: When hidden, you gain total concealment (+5 to Stealth checks and attackers have 50% miss chance).

hunters-mark.name: Hunter's Mark
hunters-mark.description: When you aim and then hit with your next attack, move the target -1 step on the condition track in addition to normal damage.

familiar-foe.name: Familiar Foe
familiar-foe.description: Gain +1 insight bonus to attack rolls against a designated target until the end of the encounter. You can designate a new target as a swift action.

hunters-target.name: Hunter's Target
hunters-target.description: Gain +2 insight bonus to damage rolls against your designated Familiar Foe target.

acute-senses.name: Acute Senses
acute-senses.description: You can reroll any Perception check, but you must keep the second result even if it's worse.

keen-shot.name: Keen Shot
keen-shot.description: Gain +1 insight bonus to ranged attack rolls against targets within 6 squares.

armored-defense.name: Armored Defense
armored-defense.description: When wearing armor, gain +1 bonus to Reflex Defense. This stacks with the armor's bonus.

juggernaut.name: Juggernaut
juggernaut.description: While wearing heavy armor, reduce damage from non-area attacks by an amount equal to your armor's equipment bonus to Reflex Defense.

second-skin.name: Second Skin
second-skin.description: Increase your armor's maximum Dexterity bonus by +1.

melee-smash.name: Melee Smash
melee-smash.description: When making a melee attack with a one-handed weapon or unarmed strike, add one-half your heroic level to damage.

stunning-strike.name: Stunning Strike
stunning-strike.description: When you deal damage with a melee attack that exceeds the target's damage threshold, move target -1 step on condition track.
stunning-strike.trigger: Melee damage exceeds target's damage threshold

unbalancing-attack.name: Unbalancing Attack
unbalancing-attack.description: After hitting with a melee attack, you may attempt to knock the target prone as a free action.
unbalancing-attack.trigger: After hitting with a melee attack

draw-fire.name: Draw Fire
draw-fire.description: As a standard action, make a Persuasion check vs target's Will Defense. If successful, target must attack you if able, and cannot attack allies within 6 squares of you unless you have cover.

keep-them-at-bay.name: Keep Them at Bay
keep-them-at-bay.description: When you aid another to suppress an attack, increase the suppression penalty from -2 to -5.

cover-fire.name: Cover Fire
cover-fire.description: When you make a ranged attack, allies within 6 squares gain +1 to all Defenses until your next turn.
cover-fire.trigger: When you make a ranged attack

battle-analysis.name: Battle Analysis
battle-analysis.description: As a swift action, make a Knowledge (tactics) check DC 15. Success grants allies within 6 squares +1 insight bonus to attack rolls for the round.

trigger-work.name: Trigger Work
trigger-work.description: Negate the -2 penalty from Rapid Shot feat when making ranged attacks.

debilitating-shot.name: Debilitating Shot
debilitating-shot.description: When you aim and hit with a ranged attack, move the target -1 step on the condition track.

knockdown-shot.name: Knockdown Shot
knockdown-shot.description: When you aim and hit with a ranged attack, knock the target prone if they are no more than two size categories larger.

multiattack-proficiency.name: Multiattack Proficiency
multiattack-proficiency.description: Reduce the penalty for making multiple attacks by 2 with a specific weapon group.

controlled-burst.name: Controlled Burst
controlled-burst.description: Reduce autofire or burst-fire penalty by 2. If braced, no penalty.

force-warning.name: Force Warning
force-warning.description: You cannot be surprised. You always act during a surprise round, even if you would not normally be aware of your opponents.

gauge-force-potential.name: Gauge Force Potential
gauge-force-potential.description: As a standard action, make a Use the Force check to determine a creature's Force Sensitivity, heroic level, and dark side score.

force-treatment.name: Force Treatment
force-treatment.description: As a standard action, make a Use the Force check instead of a Treat Injury check to treat an injured creature.

temporal-awareness.name: Temporal Awareness
temporal-awareness.description: Once per encounter, when attacked, you may move up to your speed as an immediate reaction before the attack is resolved.

rapid-reaction.name: Rapid Reaction
rapid-reaction.description: You can take one additional swift action per round.

electronic-sabotage.name: Electronic Sabotage
electronic-sabotage.description: As a standard action, use Computer to sabotage electronics. Success causes penalties or disables the target system.

trace.name: Trace
trace.description: When you access a computer system, make a Use Computer check to trace any remote users.

vehicular-evasion.name: Vehicular Evasion
vehicular-evasion.description: When piloting a vehicle, if an attack against the vehicle's Reflex Defense would deal half damage on miss, it deals no damage instead.

full-throttle.name: Full Throttle
full-throttle.description: When piloting, you may increase vehicle speed by 1 square per round as a free action.

juke.name: Juke
juke.description: Once per encounter, as a reaction when your vehicle is attacked, add your heroic level to vehicle's Reflex Defense.

starship-tactics.name: Starship Tactics
starship-tactics.description: As a swift action, grant all gunners on your starship +2 to attack rolls until the start of your next turn.

elusive-target.name: Elusive Target
elusive-target.description: When fighting defensively or using total defense, gain an additional +2 to Reflex Defense.

fringe-savant.name: Fringe Savant
fringe-savant.description: Choose one trained skill. You gain +5 competence bonus on checks with that skill.

long-stride.name: Long Stride
long-stride.description: Increase your base speed by 2 squares.

barter.name: Barter
barter.description: When buying goods or services, reduce the cost by 10% by succeeding on a Persuasion check.

weaken-resolve.name: Weaken Resolve
weaken-resolve.description: As a standard action, make a Persuasion check vs Will Defense. Success imposes -2 to all defenses until end of your next turn.

presence.name: Presence
presence.description: You can use Persuasion instead of Deception to feint in combat.

demand-surrender.name: Demand Surrender
demand-surrender.description: Once per encounter, as a standard action, make Persuasion vs Will. If target is below half HP and you succeed by 5+, target surrenders.

lucky-shot.name: Lucky Shot
lucky-shot.description: Once per day, reroll one attack roll and take the better result.

fortunes-favor.name: Fortune's Favor
fortunes-favor.description: Once per day, add +1d6 to any d20 roll after seeing the result.

knack.name: Knack
knack.description: Once per day, treat a skill check as if you rolled a natural 20.

droidcraft.name: Droidcraft
droidcraft.description: You can create droids in half the normal time. Gain +5 to Mechanics checks to repair or modify droids.

master-slicer.name: Master Slicer
master-slicer.description: Gain +5 competence bonus to Use Computer checks.

lightsaber-defense.name: Lightsaber Defense
lightsaber-defense.description: While wielding a lightsaber, gain +1 deflection bonus to Reflex Defense.

lightsaber-throw.name: Lightsaber Throw
lightsaber-throw.description: As a standard action, make a ranged attack with your lightsaber against a target within 6 squares. The lightsaber returns to your hand.

severing-strike.name: Severing Strike
severing-strike.description: When you score a critical hit with a lightsaber, you may spend a Force Point to sever one of the target's limbs (your choice). The target loses the limb and takes a persistent -5 penalty to related checks.

dark-side-sense.name: Dark Side Sense
dark-side-sense.description: As a standard action, make a Use the Force check to sense the presence of the dark side within 100 meters per level.

force-intuition.name: Force Intuition
force-intuition.description: You may use your Use the Force skill modifier instead of Initiative when making Initiative checks.

ataru.name: Ataru
ataru.description: When making acrobatic maneuvers, gain +2 to attack rolls but -2 to Reflex Defense until your next turn.

djem-so.name: Djem So
djem-so.description: When you successfully block or deflect an attack, you may make an immediate counterattack against the attacker.
djem-so.trigger: After successfully using Block or Deflect

makashi.name: Makashi
makashi.description: When wielding a lightsaber in one hand with nothing in the other, gain +2 to attack rolls against targets wielding melee weapons.
makashi.condition: Lightsaber in one hand, other hand empty

niman.name: Niman
niman.description: When you use a Force power as a standard action, you may make a single lightsaber attack as a swift action.
niman.trigger: After using a Force power as standard action

shien.name: Shien
shien.description: When you successfully deflect a ranged attack, you may spend a Force Point to automatically redirect it back at the attacker.

shii-cho.name: Shii-Cho
shii-cho.description: When wielding a lightsaber and fighting multiple opponents, gain +1 to attack and damage for each opponent beyond the first adjacent to you.

soresu.name: Soresu
soresu.description: While wielding a lightsaber, once per round you may Block or Deflect without using your reaction.

juyo.name: Juyo
juyo.description: When making a full attack with a lightsaber, gain +2 to damage rolls but -2 to all defenses until your next turn.

vaapad.name: Vaapad
vaapad.description: When you score a critical hit with a lightsaber, move the target -1 step on the condition track in addition to extra damage.

acrobatic-recovery.name: Acrobatic Recovery
acrobatic-recovery.description: When knocked prone, you may spend a Force Point to immediately stand up as a free action.

force-haze.name: Force Haze
force-haze.description: Spend a Force Point as a standard action to create a distortion in the Force. All creatures within 6 squares must succeed on a Will save (DC 15 + your Cha modifier) or be dazed for 1 round.

improved-dark-rage.name: Improved Dark Rage
improved-dark-rage.description: When using Dark Rage, you may spend a Force Point to gain an additional +2 bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and Fortitude Defense for the duration.

surge-of-power.name: Surge of Power
surge-of-power.description: Spend a Force Point as a swift action to add your heroic level to the damage dealt by your next Force power used this turn.

force-point-recovery.name: Force Point Recovery
force-point-recovery.description: Once per day, when you spend a Force Point, you may immediately regain 1 Force Point. You may spend a second Force Point to regain 2 Force Points instead.

force-fortification.name: Force Fortification
force-fortification.description: Use your Will Defense in place of your Fortitude Defense. This allows Force-based defense against physical attacks.

defensive-measures.name: Defensive Measures
defensive-measures.description: When you are flat-footed, use your Will Defense instead of being treated as flat-footed. This maintains your full defense capability.

rifle-master.name: Rifle Master
rifle-master.description: Pistol-class weapons now count as rifles for the purposes of talents and abilities that require rifles.

exotic-weapons-master.name: Exotic Weapons Master
exotic-weapons-master.description: You gain the benefits of Weapon Focus (exotic melee weapons) with any weapon group you use.

armored-spacer.name: Armored Spacer
armored-spacer.description: Treat your armor proficiency as Armor Proficiency (heavy). You can wear any armor without penalty.

take-them-alive.name: Take Them Alive
take-them-alive.description: Use opposed Persuasion checks instead of opposed combat rolls when attempting to capture or subdue opponents without killing them.

advantageous-positioning.name: Advantageous Positioning
advantageous-positioning.description: An opponent you flank is treated as flat-footed against your attacks, even if they are not flat-footed against others.

avert-disaster.name: Avert Disaster
avert-disaster.description: Turn a critical hit against you into a normal hit.
avert-disaster.trigger: When you are hit by a critical hit

aggressive-surge.name: Aggressive Surge
aggressive-surge.description: When you use Second Wind, immediately make a free charge action.

cleanse-mind.name: Cleanse Mind
cleanse-mind.description: Remove an ongoing mind-affecting effect from an ally in line of sight.
cleanse-mind.trigger: As a reaction during an encounter

dirty-fighting.name: Dirty Fighting
dirty-fighting.description: When you damage an opponent, reduce their damage threshold by 2 for the encounter.
dirty-fighting.trigger: When you deal damage to an opponent

entreat-aid.name: Entreat Aid
entreat-aid.description: An adjacent ally can aid another as a reaction to assist you, even if they have already aided once.
entreat-aid.trigger: When an adjacent ally could aid another

adrenaline-implant.name: Adrenaline Implant
adrenaline-implant.description: Once per encounter an adjacent ally gains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns while adjacent (effects do not stack).

crucial-advice.name: Crucial Advice
crucial-advice.description: Once per encounter, reroll a failed skill check with a +2 bonus.

fight-to-the-death.name: Fight to the Death
fight-to-the-death.description: Once per encounter, all allies within 6 squares heal hit points equal to your heroic level.

force-harmony.name: Force Harmony
force-harmony.description: Once per encounter, activate a Force talent that requires a Force Point without spending one.

gang-leader.name: Gang Leader
gang-leader.description: Once per encounter, when you intimidate, gain +1 per ally within 6 squares and the target’s line of sight (maximum +5).

grand-leader.name: Grand Leader
grand-leader.description: Once per encounter, grant hit points equal to 5 + half your class level to all allies within 20 squares and line of sight.

hasty-withdrawal.name: Hasty Withdrawal
hasty-withdrawal.description: Once per turn a number of allies equal to your Charisma bonus (minimum 1) within 12 squares and line of sight may withdraw as a free action.

higher-yield.name: Higher Yield
higher-yield.description: Once per encounter, add +1 damage die to a grenade or explosive.

hunter's-target.name: Hunter's Target
hunter's-target.description: Once per encounter designate an opponent as your Hunter's Target; damage vs that target increases by an amount tied to your bounty hunter level.

it's-a-trap.name: It's a Trap
it's-a-trap.description: Once per encounter set a trap for a single vehicle in line of sight that activates on that vehicle's immediate move action.

jet-pack-withdraw.name: Jet Pack Withdraw
jet-pack-withdraw.description: Once per encounter, when an enemy moves adjacent, expend one charge to fly, move your speed, or withdraw.

labyrinthine-mind.name: Labyrinthine Mind
labyrinthine-mind.description: Once per encounter, you become immune to mind-affecting effects until your next turn; the effect ends early if you choose to lose it.

lifesaver.name: Lifesaver
lifesaver.description: Once per encounter, when an adjacent ally is reduced to 0 hp or below threshold, you may move your speed to become adjacent and take the damage instead.

lightsaber-form-savant.name: Lightsaber Form Savant
lightsaber-form-savant.description: Once per encounter, return one lightsaber form to your suite without spending a Force Point.

mandalorian-advance.name: Mandalorian Advance
mandalorian-advance.description: Once per encounter on your turn, move your speed as a free action before taking other actions.

power-of-hatred.name: Power of Hatred
power-of-hatred.description: Once per encounter allies in line of sight with less than half hit points gain hit points equal to your class level.

quick-fix.name: Quick Fix
quick-fix.description: Once per encounter, jury-rig an object that is not disabled.

quick-on-your-feet.name: Quick on Your Feet
quick-on-your-feet.description: Once per encounter, move your speed.

rally.name: Rally
rally.description: Once per encounter, allies in line of sight with less than half hit points gain +2 Reflex, +2 Will, and +2 damage.

renew-vision.name: Renew Vision
renew-vision.description: Once per encounter, regain all expended uses of Farseeing.

resilience-implant.name: Resilience Implant
resilience-implant.description: Once per encounter an adjacent ally gains +5 to threshold.

seize-object.name: Seize Object
seize-object.description: Once per encounter, seize an object from an adjacent target with +10 to Disarm; must have a free hand and cannot conceal the object.

squadron-maneuvers.name: Squadron Maneuvers
squadron-maneuvers.description: Once per encounter, grant the prerequisite of a chosen talent to every ship in your squadron until the end of the encounter.

squadron-tactics.name: Squadron Tactics
squadron-tactics.description: Once per encounter, grant a maneuver you use to every ship in your squadron next round.

strength-implant.name: Strength Implant
strength-implant.description: Once per encounter an adjacent ally gains +1 damage die.

strike-and-run.name: Strike and Run
strike-and-run.description: Once per encounter, after you damage an opponent, you may move your speed.

surge.name: Surge
surge.description: Once per encounter, move up to your speed.

surge-of-light.name: Surge of Light
surge-of-light.description: Once per encounter, return any light side power without spending a Force Point.

telekinetic-savant.name: Telekinetic Savant
telekinetic-savant.description: Once per encounter, return Force disarm, slam, thrust, or Move Object to your suite without spending a Force Point.

uncanny-luck.name: Uncanny Luck
uncanny-luck.description: Once per encounter, any roll of 16 or higher is treated as a natural 20.

urgency.name: Urgency
urgency.description: Once per encounter, increase the speed of allies in line of sight by 2.

vital-encouragement.name: Vital Encouragement
vital-encouragement.description: Once per encounter, you gain hit points equal to 10 + half your Heroic Level.

weak-point.name: Weak Point
weak-point.description: Once per encounter, ignore a single target’s DR for the rest of your turn.

advanced-intel.name: Advanced Intel
advanced-intel.description: If you are not surprised, you may use Spotter in the surprise round.

assault-tactics.name: Assault Tactics
assault-tactics.description: DC 15 Tactics check designate a single object or creature; allies who can hear you deal extra d6 damage until your next turn.

aversion.name: Aversion
aversion.description: Until end of encounter, all squares within 2 squares of you are difficult terrain for enemies.

beast-trick.name: Beast Trick
beast-trick.description: Use Mind Trick on beasts with Intelligence 2 or less; they cannot perform or understand complex directions.

black-market-buyer.name: Black Market Buyer
black-market-buyer.description: Automatically locate a black market merchant.

blowback.name: Blowback
blowback.description: If you exceed the target's threshold, push the target 1 square.

breach-cover.name: Breach Cover
breach-cover.description: Ignore cover when firing or throwing a weapon with burst or splash.

breaching-explosive.name: Breaching Explosive
breaching-explosive.description: Ignore door and wall thresholds when using mines and non-grenade explosives.

bring-them-back.name: Bring Them Back
bring-them-back.description: Revive a target that died within a number of rounds equal to half your heroic level.

bunker-blaster.name: Bunker Blaster
bunker-blaster.description: If adjacent to an object that provides cover to your target, you may aim at that target as a move action.

call-weapon.name: Call Weapon
call-weapon.description: Call and ignite a lightsaber you built as a free action if it is within line of sight.

cause-mutation.name: Cause Mutation
cause-mutation.description: Transform a creature into a Sith Abomination or Chrysalis Beast under your control; process takes days and yields creatures with new class level.

channel-energy.name: Channel Energy
channel-energy.description: Convert energy from Negate Energy to activate any power in your suite.

close-contact.name: Close Contact
close-contact.description: Point-blank range increased by 5 squares; short range begins 5 squares later but ends at the same distance.

collective-visions.name: Collective Visions
collective-visions.description: Force-users with Farseeing can aid another as a reaction within 6 squares.

competitive-edge.name: Competitive Edge
competitive-edge.description: When you and allies are not surprised, number of allies equal to your Charisma modifier benefit from Quick Draw.

crippling-strike.name: Crippling Strike
crippling-strike.description: On a critical hit, you can reduce the target’s speed by half until fully healed.

cunning-distraction.name: Cunning Distraction
cunning-distraction.description: If you feint in combat, you may move half your speed as part of the feint.

curved-throw.name: Curved Throw
curved-throw.description: Ignore cover (not total cover) with razor bugs and thud bugs.

custom-model.name: Custom Model
custom-model.description: Add one modification from Tech Specialist to an Improvised Device without affecting the item's value.

dark-side-adept.name: Dark Side Adept
dark-side-adept.description: Reroll one Dark Side skill check.

dark-side-master.name: Dark Side Master
dark-side-master.description: Reroll any Dark Side skill check.

deny-move.name: Deny Move
deny-move.description: On a critical hit, target cannot move on its next turn.

distant-command.name: Distant Command
distant-command.description: You do not lose Born Leader’s benefits if out of line of sight.

echoes-in-the-force.name: Echoes in the Force
echoes-in-the-force.description: Use Farseeing on a location to view the past; DC 20 plus one per day into the past.

emergency-team.name: Emergency Team
emergency-team.description: Allies automatically succeed at aid another for medical tasks.

empower-weapon.name: Empower Weapon
empower-weapon.description: Add one damage die to the empowered weapon.

exotic-weapon-mastery.name: Exotic Weapon Mastery
exotic-weapon-mastery.description: Become proficient with any exotic weapon feat even if you do not possess the feat.

exploit-weakness.name: Exploit Weakness
exploit-weakness.description: When you use Assault Tactics, the target takes a cumulative -1 Reflex each time it is damaged (max -5).

exposing-strike.name: Exposing Strike
exposing-strike.description: When you damage an opponent with a lightsaber, you may spend a Force Point to make the opponent flat-footed until the end of your next turn.

extra-first-aid.name: Extra First Aid
extra-first-aid.description: You can perform first aid one additional time per day on a target.

fleet-deployment.name: Fleet Deployment
fleet-deployment.description: A number of vehicles equal to your class level in line of sight may each move a number of squares equal to their speed.

force-revive.name: Force Revive
force-revive.description: An ally affected by Battle Meditation reduced to 0 hp may take Second Wind as a reaction and falls unconscious.

fortified-body.name: Fortified Body
fortified-body.description: Immune to disease, poison, and radiation.

grabber.name: Grabber
grabber.description: You do not take the -5 penalty when using the grab action.

greater-focused-force-talisman.name: Greater Focused Force Talisman
greater-focused-force-talisman.description: As Focused Force Talisman but the Force Point does not count toward the one-per-turn limit.

guaranteed-shot.name: Guaranteed Shot
guaranteed-shot.description: With two pistols, even if you miss, deal damage equal to half your heroic level.

guidance.name: Guidance
guidance.description: Show an ally in line of sight how to ignore difficult terrain until your next turn (does not apply to you).

gun-club.name: Gun Club
gun-club.description: Use a gun as a melee weapon without penalty; with a bayonet, it counts as both a blade and a club.

healing-boost.name: Healing Boost
healing-boost.description: Damage healed with Vital Transfer increases by 1 point per class level.

hyperdriven.name: Hyperdriven
hyperdriven.description: Once per day, add your class level to an attack, skill, or ability check.

illusion-bond.name: Illusion Bond
illusion-bond.description: You can see or hear as if standing in the space of your humanoid illusion.

immovable.name: Immovable
immovable.description: Attempts to move you involuntarily suffer a -5 penalty to their check or attack.

impel-ally-i.name: Impel Ally I
impel-ally-i.description: Designate an ally to move immediately at normal speed; must move immediately or the effect is wasted; usable three times per turn.

improved-consulars-vitality.name: Improved Consular's Vitality
improved-consulars-vitality.description: When you damage an opponent, you can use Consular's Vitality as a free action.

improved-healing-boost.name: Improved Healing Boost
improved-healing-boost.description: Healing Boost increases damage healed by 2 points per class level.

improved-sentinels-gambit.name: Improved Sentinel's Gambit
improved-sentinels-gambit.description: You may use Sentinel's Gambit additional times per encounter equal to half your class level.

improved-weaken-resolve.name: Improved Weaken Resolve
improved-weaken-resolve.description: As Weaken Resolve, but the target continues fleeing beyond the initial duration.

improvised-weapon-master.name: Improvised Weapon Master
improvised-weapon-master.description: No penalty when using improvised weapons.

indomitable-will.name: Indomitable Will
indomitable-will.description: Immune to all mind-affecting effects for 1 minute.

influential-friends.name: Influential Friends
influential-friends.description: Once per day, friends may take 20 on a skill check with modifier equal to 5 + half your heroic level; time taken is 10 × result minimum.

jedi-network.name: Jedi Network
jedi-network.description: Includes Acquire Equipment or Funds, Obtain Info, Receive Medical Attention, and Secure Safe House benefits.

keep-it-going.name: Keep It Going
keep-it-going.description: If you reduce your prime target to 0 hit points, designate a new prime target.

knockback.name: Knockback
knockback.description: On a critical hit, move the opponent back 1 square if not grabbed or into an obstacle; effect applies within two size categories.

make-do.name: Make Do
make-do.description: No penalty when using improvised weapons.

masterwork-lightsaber.name: Masterwork Lightsaber
masterwork-lightsaber.description: Add one extra accessory to a lightsaber you built; reroll one damage die if you built it; mentoring another reduces their DC by 5.

mercenarys-determination.name: Mercenary's Determination
mercenarys-determination.description: Double your speed for 1 round; must wait 5 rounds between uses.

no-escape.name: No Escape
no-escape.description: When an opponent withdraws, that opponent is considered flat-footed against you until the end of your next turn.

noble-fencing-style.name: Noble Fencing Style
noble-fencing-style.description: Use Charisma modifier in place of Strength modifier with light melee weapons or a lightsaber.

one-for-the-team.name: One for the Team
one-for-the-team.description: You may take half or all damage for an adjacent ally; an ally may take the same for you.

only-the-finest.name: Only the Finest
only-the-finest.description: Obtain modified items without increasing their base value.

perfect-telepathy.name: Perfect Telepathy
perfect-telepathy.description: You can communicate in full sentences and complete thoughts telepathically without altering the subject.

phalanx.name: Phalanx
phalanx.description: If you provide soft cover to an ally within 3 squares, it becomes improved cover.

prepared-explosive.name: Prepared Explosive
prepared-explosive.description: A non-grenade explosive you set can turn normal terrain into difficult and difficult into normal.

psychic-defenses.name: Psychic Defenses
psychic-defenses.description: When targeted by mind-affecting powers, they automatically take damage equal to 1d6 × your Wisdom modifier (minimum ×1).

psychometry.name: Psychometry
psychometry.description: Target an object you hold; read impressions up to 5 years per level.

pursuit.name: Pursuit
pursuit.description: Not restricted to a straight line when running; may reroll Endurance checks.

quick-modification.name: Quick Modification
quick-modification.description: Spend 1 minute to remove an accessory and add another to a lightsaber you built.

quick-modifications.name: Quick Modifications
quick-modifications.description: When creating a field-created weapon, add one modification at creation.

raiders-frenzy.name: Raider's Frenzy
raiders-frenzy.description: Once per round, if you or an ally within 6 squares damage a target, allies in line of sight deal additional damage equal to half your class level to that target.

ready-and-willing.name: Ready and Willing
ready-and-willing.description: You may take a readied action at the end of the current turn after an opponent takes its action.

reduce-mobility.name: Reduce Mobility
reduce-mobility.description: On a critical hit, target’s speed is halved until healed to full hit points.

respected-officer.name: Respected Officer
respected-officer.description: Automatically improve the attitude of an indifferent NPC to friendly with no check required.

security-slicer.name: Security Slicer
security-slicer.description: Disable security without a security kit; on a failure by 10 or more, something goes wrong.

sentinels-observation.name: Sentinel's Observation
sentinels-observation.description: If you have concealment against a target, you may spend a Force Point to make the opponent flat-footed until the end of your next turn.

shaped-explosion.name: Shaped Explosion
shaped-explosion.description: Create blasts in a line or cone: length = 2× radius; cone length = 3× blast radius; origin from explosive’s square.

share-talent.name: Share Talent
share-talent.description: Once per day, grant use of a Lightsaber Combat tree, Duelist, or Forms talent to allies within 12 squares equal to half your class level for the encounter.

signature-item.name: Signature Item
signature-item.description: With a specific item, gain +2 on opposed skill checks; multiple items stack +1 each.

single-weapon-flourish-i.name: Single Weapon Flourish I
single-weapon-flourish-i.description: With one light melee weapon or lightsaber, you can move your speed as a free action.

sith-alchemy-craft.name: Sith Alchemy (craft)
sith-alchemy-craft.description: Create Sith Amulets, Sith Armor, Sith Talismans, or Sith Weapons per Sith Alchemy rules.

sith-alchemy-specialist.name: Sith Alchemy Specialist
sith-alchemy-specialist.description: Modify items to add Sith Alchemy traits.

soothing-presence.name: Soothing Presence
soothing-presence.description: Automatically shift an unfriendly beast to indifferent.

spontaneous-skill.name: Spontaneous Skill
spontaneous-skill.description: Once per day, make a skill check as if trained; may be used multiple times per day with separate skills.

sprint.name: Sprint
sprint.description: Run up to five times your speed.

squad-superiority.name: Squad Superiority
squad-superiority.description: If you and at least two allies are adjacent to the target, the target is flat-footed.

stalwart-subordinates.name: Stalwart Subordinates
stalwart-subordinates.description: An ally within 12 squares and line of sight targeted by an effect forces the enemy to reroll and take the lowest.

stay-in-the-fight-recruit.name: Stay in the Fight (Recruit)
stay-in-the-fight-recruit.description: A recruited enemy may immediately use Second Wind as a reaction.

stick-together.name: Stick Together
stick-together.description: If an ally moves, you may move before your next turn, ending within 3 squares of that ally.

stolen-form.name: Stolen Form
stolen-form.description: Choose any Force Technique or a lightsaber form and add it to your usable options.

stymie.name: Stymie
stymie.description: Once per round, target within 12 squares and line of sight takes -5 to one skill until the start of your next turn.

surefooted.name: Surefooted
surefooted.description: Speed is not reduced by difficult terrain.

takedown.name: Takedown
takedown.description: When you deal damage at the end of a charge, you knock the target prone if no more than one size larger than you.

team-recruiting.name: Team Recruiting
team-recruiting.description: You can use Recruit Enemy when you or an ally would deal killing damage, not only when you deal it.

thrown-lightsaber-mastery.name: Thrown Lightsaber Mastery
thrown-lightsaber-mastery.description: Targets struck by a thrown lightsaber move at half speed (round down) until your next turn.

tough-as-nails.name: Tough as Nails
tough-as-nails.description: Catch a Second Wind one extra time per encounter.

transfer-essence.name: Transfer Essence
transfer-essence.description: If your Dark Side Score equals your Wisdom, upon death you become a dark side spirit able to possess others or enter an object.

turret-self-destruct.name: Turret Self-Destruct
turret-self-destruct.description: When a turret is reduced to 0 hp it self-destructs in a 2-square radius dealing its normal damage; you may disable it as a reaction if adjacent.

unsavory-reputation.name: Unsavory Reputation
unsavory-reputation.description: When an opponent is reduced to half hit points within 6 squares of you, they take -2 to attack and skill checks for the rest of the encounter.

visions.name: Visions
visions.description: See into the past or future with farseeing, up to one year per your level.

ward.name: Ward
ward.description: Provide soft cover to one adjacent ally.

watch-this.name: Watch This
watch-this.description: You can move into the same space as a frigate or larger without collision and may occupy the same space.

zone-of-recuperation.name: Zone of Recuperation
zone-of-recuperation.description: Any ally who uses Second Wind in your Safe Zone regains additional hit points equal to your class level.
